body.p: While hosting an event in AirClassroom, there are safety precautions that must be followed. They are simple but, if followed, will lead to a seamless, coordinated event.

The safety precautions are:
You should not commit physical or sexual assault, sexual abuse, domestic violence, robbery, human trafficking, other acts of violence, or hold anyone against their will.
You should not convey an intent to harm anyone by your words or physical actions.
You should not keep unsecured weapons, disease risks, or dangerous animals in your listing, nor should you create conditions that increase the likelihood of a fire or impede escape in the event of emergency.
